hero.title: From Space to the Core
hero.sub: We Read What the Earth Has Written
hero.desc: Extreme environment intelligence engineered for the heart of the Arabian Shield.

01.title: Orbital Intelligence
01.desc: High-bandwidth satellite uplinks beam real-time geological data from the field to your command center.

02.title: Aerial Precision
02.desc: Autonomous drone swarms work in synchronization, identifying anomalies with surgical precision.

03.title: Ground Robotics
03.desc: Quadrupedal systems navigate uncharted hazardous terrains without human intervention or GPS.

04.title: The Abyss
04.desc: LIBS Spectral Analysis identifies the chemical fingerprint of gold and lithium in real-time.

caseStudy.title: A New Golden Age
caseStudy.desc: Traditional prospecting in remote regions is slow, expensive, and error-prone. QASSAS shifts exploration to autonomous 24/7 operation with consistent data quality.
caseStudy.quote: “Qassas technology has transformed our exploration program. What used to take years now takes months.”
caseStudy.author: [Name], [Title], [Mining Company]

pillars.title: Why Space Tech for Mining?
pillars.p1_desc: Reduce 'dry' drilling by up to 50% through high-fidelity subsurface 3D imaging.
pillars.p2_desc: Deploy autonomous units into hazardous zones where humans cannot safely tread.
pillars.p3_desc: Minimally invasive exploration with near-zero surface footprint until certainty.

mission.title: Intelligence Engineered for the Impossible.
mission.body: For decades, the most advanced robotic intelligences were built to survive the harsh, unpredictable environments of deep space. Today, QASSAS brings that same extreme-environment intelligence to mining. Our autonomous systems don't just explore—they analyze, map, and predict, transforming geological exploration into a high-precision, sovereign science.

ctaBlock.title: Ready to Discover What Lies Beneath?
ctaBlock.desc: Join the new era of sovereign geological exploration.

whitepaper.title: The Sovereign White Paper
whitepaper.desc: The Space-to-Earth Framework. A technical deep-dive into sovereign geological intelligence.
whitepaper.b1: Complete technical architecture of the QASSAS ecosystem
whitepaper.b2: ROI analysis for mining exploration operations
whitepaper.b3: Integration pathways for existing geological workflows

demo.title: Request Demo
demo.desc: Talk to us about sovereign initiatives, partnerships, or deployment.

testimonial.label: QUOTE BLOCK
testimonial.quote: Qassas has transformed our exploration workflow. We moved from months of uncertainty to actionable targets in days.
testimonial.author: — [Name], [Title], [Mining Company]
